wxExStatusBarPane Class Reference

This class defines our statusbar panes, used by wxExFrame::SetupStatusBar. More...

 Constructor.

Detailed Description

This class defines our statusbar panes, used by wxExFrame::SetupStatusBar.

It just adds some members to the base class, and keeps a static total.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

wxExStatusBarPane::wxExStatusBarPane ( int  width = -3,
int  style = wxSB_NORMAL 
) [inline]

Default constructor.

This constructs the pane text field.

wxExStatusBarPane::wxExStatusBarPane ( const wxString &  name,
int  width = 50,
const wxString &  helptext = wxEmptyString,
int  style = wxSB_NORMAL 
) [inline]

Constructor.

Parameters:
nameThe name of the pane. The wxextension lib uses PaneLexer, PaneInfo, PaneFileType, by setting up one of these panes, youre panes will get controlled by the lib.
widthWidth of the field
helptextThe helptext shown as a tooltip. If you do no provide helptext, it is derived from the name, by using text after the first 'e' character (so after 'Pane').
styleThe style.
